rules_text:
First strike, vigilance
Whenever you attack, you may return a creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking, then [b][creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.][/b]
Paradigm {2}{R}{G} [i](You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
